Job Listings

Browse through available job listings and verify their legitimacy

{{ error }}

No jobs found

Try adjusting your search or filter criteria.

{{ job.title }}

{{ job.location }}

{{ job.industry }}
Posted {{ job.createdAt | date:'mediumDate' }}

Company Profile

{{ job.companyProfile }}

Description

{{ job.description }}

{{ verificationResults[job.id].result.message }}

  • {{ detail }}
import { Component, OnInit, Renderer2 } from '@angular/core'; import { JobService } from '../../services/job.service'; import { Job, JobVerificationResult } from '../../models/job.model'; @Component({ selector: 'app-job-listings', templateUrl: './job-listings.component.html', styleUrls: ['./job-listings.component.css'] }) export class JobListingsComponent implements OnInit { jobs: Job[] = []; filteredJobs: Job[] = []; isLoading: boolean = true; error: string | null = null; searchTerm: string = ''; selectedFilter: string = 'all'; sortOption: string = 'newest'; verificationResults: { [key: string]: { isVerifying: boolean, result?: JobVerificationResult } } = {}; cardAnimationState: { [key: string]: 'initial' | 'visible' | 'pulse' } = {}; animationDelayIncrement: number = 100; // ms between each card animation isDarkMode: boolean = false; constructor( private jobService: JobService, private renderer: Renderer2 ) { } ngOnInit(): void { this.loadJobs(); this.checkDarkMode(); } private checkDarkMode(): void { // Check if dark mode is enabled by looking at the html element's class const htmlElement = document.documentElement; this.isDarkMode = htmlElement.classList.contains('dark'); // Set up a mutation observer to watch for theme changes const observer = new MutationObserver((mutations) => { mutations.forEach((mutation) => { if (mutation.attributeName === 'class') { this.isDarkMode = htmlElement.classList.contains('dark'); } }); }); observer.observe(htmlElement, { attributes: true }); } loadJobs(): void { this.isLoading = true; this.error = null; this.jobService.getJobs().subscribe({ next: (jobs) => { this.jobs = jobs; this.applyFilters(); this.isLoading = false; // Initialize animation states for all jobs setTimeout(() => { this.jobs.forEach((job, index) => { if (job.id) { // Set initial state this.cardAnimationState[job.id] = 'initial'; // Stagger the animations setTimeout(() => { if (job.id) { this.cardAnimationState[job.id] = 'visible'; } }, index * this.animationDelayIncrement); } }); }, 0); }, error: (err) => { console.error('Error loading jobs:', err); this.error = 'Failed to load jobs. Please try again later.'; this.isLoading = false; } }); } applyFilters(): void { // Filter by search term and industry let filtered = this.jobs; // Apply search filter if (this.searchTerm.trim() !== '') { const searchTermLower = this.searchTerm.toLowerCase(); filtered = filtered.filter(job => job.title.toLowerCase().includes(searchTermLower) || job.description.toLowerCase().includes(searchTermLower) || job.companyProfile.toLowerCase().includes(searchTermLower) || job.location.toLowerCase().includes(searchTermLower) ); } // Apply industry filter if (this.selectedFilter !== 'all') { filtered = filtered.filter(job => job.industry === this.selectedFilter); } // Apply sorting if (this.sortOption === 'a-z') { filtered = filtered.sort((a, b) => a.title.localeCompare(b.title)); } else if (this.sortOption === 'z-a') { filtered = filtered.sort((a, b) => b.title.localeCompare(a.title)); } else if (this.sortOption === 'newest') { // Assuming jobs have a createdAt field filtered = filtered.sort((a, b) => { const dateA = new Date(a.createdAt || 0); const dateB = new Date(b.createdAt || 0); return dateB.getTime() - dateA.getTime(); }); } else if (this.sortOption === 'oldest') { filtered = filtered.sort((a, b) => { const dateA = new Date(a.createdAt || 0); const dateB = new Date(b.createdAt || 0); return dateA.getTime() - dateB.getTime(); }); } this.filteredJobs = filtered; } resetFilters(): void { this.searchTerm = ''; this.selectedFilter = 'all'; this.sortOption = 'newest'; this.applyFilters(); } getIndustryCategories(): string[] { // Extract unique industry categories from jobs const industries = new Set(); this.jobs.forEach(job => { if (job.industry) { industries.add(job.industry); } }); return Array.from(industries).sort(); } verifyJob(jobId: string): void { // If already verified, trigger pulse animation if (this.verificationResults[jobId]?.result) { if (this.cardAnimationState[jobId]) { this.cardAnimationState[jobId] = 'pulse'; setTimeout(() => { if (this.cardAnimationState[jobId]) { this.cardAnimationState[jobId] = 'visible'; } }, 600); // Match the pulse animation duration } } // Set verifying state this.verificationResults[jobId] = { isVerifying: true }; this.jobService.verifyJobById(jobId).subscribe({ next: (result) => { this.verificationResults[jobId] = { isVerifying: false, result: result }; // Trigger pulse animation after verification if (this.cardAnimationState[jobId]) { this.cardAnimationState[jobId] = 'pulse'; setTimeout(() => { if (this.cardAnimationState[jobId]) { this.cardAnimationState[jobId] = 'visible'; } }, 600); // Match the pulse animation duration } }, error: (err) => { console.error('Error verifying job:', err); this.verificationResults[jobId] = { isVerifying: false, result: { isFake: true, message: 'Error verifying job', details: ['An error occurred while trying to verify this job. Please try again later.'] } }; } }); } truncateText(text: string, maxLength: number): string { if (text.length <= maxLength) { return text; } return text.substring(0, maxLength) + '...'; } onCardClick(event: MouseEvent, jobId?: string): void { // Don't trigger for clicks on buttons or links inside the card if ( event.target instanceof HTMLElement && (event.target.tagName === 'BUTTON' || event.target.tagName === 'A' || event.target.closest('button') || event.target.closest('a')) ) { return; } // If job has not been verified yet, verify it if (jobId && !this.verificationResults[jobId]) { this.verifyJob(jobId); } // If job has already been verified, trigger pulse animation else if (jobId && this.cardAnimationState[jobId]) { this.cardAnimationState[jobId] = 'pulse'; setTimeout(() => { if (this.cardAnimationState[jobId]) { this.cardAnimationState[jobId] = 'visible'; } }, 600); } } // Add missing expandDescription method expandDescription(jobId: string): void { // This method would typically open a modal or expand the job details // For now, we'll just log it console.log('Expanding description for job:', jobId); // Find the job const job = this.jobs.find(j => j.id === jobId); if (job) { // Here you would typically show a modal or navigate to a detail page // For example: // this.router.navigate(['/jobs', jobId]); // or // this.modalService.open(JobDetailComponent, { job }); } } }
